Package TADK

Class BusController

java.lang.Object
TADK.BusController
public class BusController
extends java.lang.Object
This is the bus controller class which sets up the device as a bus controller which can accept commands from the host machine and send them to other remote terminals on the bus

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    BusController​(java.lang.String ip, int port)
    This will connect you to TADK on given IP and Port and will configure the TADK as BC

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    DeviceData broadcast​(DeviceData data)
    this method is used to send broadcast command
    DeviceData queryBcRt​(int rtAddress, int subAddress, short[] data)
    This method is used to send a BC->RT command, and reads the response from TADK as well.
    DeviceData queryModeCode​(int rtAddress, int modecode, short[] data)
    This method is used to send a modecode command, and reads the response as well
    DeviceData queryRt​(DeviceData data)
    This method is used to send a BC-RT or RT-BC message
    DeviceData queryRtBc​(int rtAddress, int subAddress, short[] data)
    This method is used to send an RT->BC command, and read the response
    DeviceData queryRtRt​(int txRtAddress, int txSubAddress, int rxRtAddress, int rxSubAddress)
    This method is used to send RT->RT commands

  • Constructor Details

    • BusController

      public BusController​(java.lang.String ip, int port) throws java.net.UnknownHostException, java.io.IOException, FailedToConfigure, FailedToDecode
      This will connect you to TADK on given IP and Port and will configure the TADK as BC
      Parameters:
      ip - IP address of TADK
      port - TCP Port of TADK
      Throws:
      java.net.UnknownHostException
      java.io.IOException
      FailedToConfigure
      FailedToDecode

  • Method Details

    • queryRt

      public DeviceData queryRt​(DeviceData data) throws java.net.UnknownHostException, java.io.IOException
      This method is used to send a BC-RT or RT-BC message
      Parameters:
      data - The data object to be sent
      Returns:
      DeviceData The TADK response is returned
      Throws:
      java.net.UnknownHostException
      java.io.IOException

    • queryBcRt

      public DeviceData queryBcRt​(int rtAddress, int subAddress, short[] data) throws java.net.UnknownHostException, java.io.IOException
      This method is used to send a BC->RT command, and reads the response from TADK as well.
      Parameters:
      rtAddress - RT address
      subAddress - Subadress of the RT, the data is written to be
      data - (1-32)MIL-STD-1553 Data words, the word count depends on the size of this array.
      Returns:
      DeviceData Response packet read from TADK is returned.
      Throws:
      java.net.UnknownHostException
      java.io.IOException

    • queryRtBc

      public DeviceData queryRtBc​(int rtAddress, int subAddress, short[] data) throws java.net.UnknownHostException, java.io.IOException
      This method is used to send an RT->BC command, and read the response
      Parameters:
      rtAddress - RT address
      subAddress - Subaddress of the RT, the data is read to be
      data -
      Returns:
      DeviceData
      Throws:
      java.net.UnknownHostException
      java.io.IOException

    • queryRtRt

      public DeviceData queryRtRt​(int txRtAddress, int txSubAddress, int rxRtAddress, int rxSubAddress) throws java.net.UnknownHostException, java.io.IOException
      This method is used to send RT->RT commands
      Parameters:
      txRtAddress - RT address which will sends data
      txSubAddress - Subadress of transmitting RT
      rxRtAddress - address of Receiving RT
      rxSubAddress - SubAddress of Receiving RT
      Returns:
      DeviceData
      Throws:
      java.net.UnknownHostException
      java.io.IOException

    • queryModeCode

      public DeviceData queryModeCode​(int rtAddress, int modecode, short[] data) throws java.net.UnknownHostException, java.io.IOException
      This method is used to send a modecode command, and reads the response as well
      Parameters:
      rtAddress - address of RT to be sent command
      modecode - ModeCode number as per MIL-STD-1553B protocol
      data - Data Words
      Returns:
      DeviceData
      Throws:
      java.net.UnknownHostException
      java.io.IOException

    • broadcast

      public DeviceData broadcast​(DeviceData data) throws java.net.UnknownHostException, java.io.IOException
      this method is used to send broadcast command
      Parameters:
      data - Data object
      Returns:
      DeviceData Response from TADK
      Throws:
      java.net.UnknownHostException
      java.io.IOException
